definitions.definition: a piece of equipment with several moving parts that uses power to do a particular type of work:
examples: The different sizes of eggs are sorted by a machine.

definitions.definition: to sew cloth with a sewing machine:
examples: I've almost finished making the curtains - I just have to machine the hem.

definitions.definition: to cut or shape metal on a machine:
examples: Tungsten carbide tools are used extensively for machining steel.
